BusinessName.BusinessNameLine2Txt: EMPLOYEES M P T A & A

IRS990.Desc: THE OBJECTIVES OF THE INTERNATIONAL, AS THE REPRESENTATIVE OF ITS MEMBERS, ARE tO ESTABLISH NECESSARY PROCEDURES FOR THE AMICABLE ADJUSTMENT OF ALL DISPUTES WHICH MAY ARISE BETWEEN EMPLOYERS AND EMPLOYEES, and to IMPROVE WORKING CONDITIONS AND LIVING STANDARDS OF MEMBERS THROUGH COLLECTIVE BARGAINING, EDUCATION, TRAINING AND EMPLOYEE BENEFITS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCHEDULE I, PART I, LINE 2, GRANTS AND DONATIONS TO US ORGANIZATIONS:SIGNIFICANT GRANTS AND DONATIONS ARE APPROVED BY THE GENERAL EXECUTIVE BOARD AND RECORDS ARE KEPT FOR ALL THE DONATIONS AND CONTRIBUTIONS MADE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part I, Line 1a: Relevant information in regards to selections on 1a.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INTERNATIONAL PROVIDES FIRST CLASS TRAVEL FOR ITS PRESIDENT AND GENERAL SECRETARY-TREASURER AND THEIR SPOUSES AS DEEMED NECESSARY TO CONDUCT OFFICIAL BUSINESS AND, IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES, PERMITS FIRST CLASS TRAVEL FOR VICE PRESIDENTS. SPOUSAL TRAVEL COSTS ARE CONSIDERED TAXABLE COMPENSATION, if applicable.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 WAS PREPARED IN COORDINATION WITH OFFICERS WHO WORK FULL TIME FOR THE ORGANIZATION. ONCE COMPLETE, THE FORM WAS PROVIDED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S GENERAL EXECUTIVE BOARD FOR THEIR REVIEW PRIOR TO SUBMISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC AND TO MEMBERS TO THE EXTENT REQUIRED BY LAW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Other Changes In Net Assets Or Fund Balances - Other Decreases
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: pension related expenses other than benefit costs = -$1215280

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: PART IV LINE 12 & PART XI QUESTION 2D
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES AN ANNUAL AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENT ON THE ACCRUAL BASIS OF ACCOUNTING OF THE COMBINED BOOKS AND RECORDS OF THE ORGANIZATION AND ITS RELATED REALTY HOLDING CORPORATIONS AND POLITICAL ACTION COMMITTEES.
